propositions.text: 长生 story revolves around a woman's struggle for freedom and identity within a restrictive family and societal structure.
Initial setting in a flourishing江湖 (jianghu) world where women's status is superficially elevated but internally oppressive.
Family conflicts and past grievances create a web of control and obligation over personal relationships.
Emotional entanglements and societal pressures deepen the protagonist's sense of entrapment.
Separation and loss mark a turning point, intensifying the protagonist's isolation and despair.
The protagonist experiences profound loneliness after her husband's departure.
A glimmer of hope emerges through unexpected familial support, offering temporary refuge.
Journey into the江湖 symbolizes a quest for self-discovery and liberation from family constraints.
Encounters with challenges and adversaries test and strengthen the protagonist's resolve.
Alliance with a侠士 (侠士, chivalrous warrior) provides emotional and physical support.
Revelation of family secrets and power struggles fuels the protagonist's desire for justice.
Determination to confront family elders and expose their manipulations.
Final confrontation in the family ancestral hall achieves partial victory and personal freedom.
A new beginning with the侠士 in a secluded life signifies resolution and peace.

concepts.name: 长生 (Longevity/Immortality)
concepts.context: Title and thematic core, possibly symbolizing enduring struggle or aspiration.

concepts.name: 江湖 (Jianghu)
concepts.context: Martial world setting representing freedom and danger.

concepts.name: 家族 (Family)
concepts.context: Central oppressive structure controlling personal destiny.

concepts.name: 女子 (Woman/Protagonist)
concepts.context: Main character embodying struggle against societal and familial constraints.

concepts.name: 侠士 (Chivalrous Warrior)
concepts.context: Supportive ally offering protection and companionship.

concepts.name: 恩怨 (Grievances)
concepts.context: Historical family conflicts driving current tensions.

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a linear narrative structure with five chapters, progressing from internal family conflict to external exploration in the江湖, culminating in resolution and personal liberation.
